availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harvey S. Park (2nd Regiment Kentucky Cavalry)

body.p: Elizabethtown, Kentucky, soldier. Elizabethtown native. Son of John Park and Armenia Park. First lieutenant and captain in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 56.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, Northern District, p. 397B.
